# GEO 42

> The Answer Engine for Enterprise Brands

GEO 42 is the AI visibility platform that makes your brand the definitive answer across every generative engine â€” ChatGPT, Perplexity, Gemini, and beyond.

## Services
- AI Visibility &amp; Brand Presence Tracking: Track how often your brand appears in AI answers, monitor brand mentions, measure share of visibility, analyze source citations, assess brand sentiment, and optimize content AEO performance across all major AI answer engines.
- Prompt &amp; Demand Intelligence: Discover what millions of people ask AI with real-time search volume insights. Monitor prompt volume trends, topic-level demand, audience question patterns, and conversation trends versus traditional search.
- AI Response &amp; Citation Analytics: Understand how AI models talk about your brand. Analyze frequency of appearance, response content, citation sources, referenced pages, and track ranking improvements over time through Answer Engine Insights.
- AI Crawler &amp; Agent Analytics: Gain full visibility into how AI sees your website. Monitor AI crawler access, bot frequency, technical indexing, readability analysis, and content accessibility for AI retrieval.
- Traffic &amp; Attribution Analytics: Measure the downstream impact of AI visibility. Track human traffic from AI search, attribute conversions to AI platforms, identify pages driving AI-sourced traffic, and prove content marketing ROI.
- AI Shopping &amp; Product Visibility: Boost product visibility in ChatGPT Shopping and AI assistants. Track shopping placement, trigger keywords, response-level product analysis, and measure traffic and conversion impact from AI shopping.
- GEO + SEO Content Marketing: Create AI-optimized content that performs across both generative engines and traditional search. GEO 42&#39;s Content Marketing Brain efficiently acquires global customers through integrated GEO and SEO strategies.

## Contact
- Email: hello@geo42.ai
- Website: https://alexroessner.github.io/MagUpSite/
